titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory to the Leland Lasell Rounds Papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff; machine-readable finding aid created by James Ryan.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2018-02-06T15:42-0800

change.item: 2018 January 31: Added links to materials from the 2018 release of declassified records subseries that are available on digitalcollections.hoover.org. -Sally DeBauche <date calendar="gregorian" normal="20120806" era="ce">August 6, 2012</date><item>Revised to update encoding by Samira Bozorgi</item></change><change><date calendar="gregorian" normal="20040323" era="ce">March 23, 2004</date><item>PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Leland Lasell Rounds Papers)//EN" "rounds.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).</item>

did.abstract: Correspondence, memoranda, orders, printed matter, and photographs, relating to French and American aerial operations in World War I, and to Allied intelligence operations in North Africa preceding Allied landings in 1942. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection open for research. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items, computer media, and digital files. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos, films, or digital files during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Leland Lasell Rounds papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1971.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

altformavail.head: Alternate Forms Available
altformavail.p: Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.
